page.title: 14The Celts in our Area.
page.content: { }In our area there are tumuli. These are Celtic burial mounds. One tumulus had a whole village of{Bronze Age {people}buried inside. Also at{Goodern {Manor Farm}there is an Earthwork which has a ring of hawthorn bushes around the perimeter.In our area there is one Earthwork and five Tumuli.{Carrine {Common Tumulus}is the biggest. It stands in the middle of a field where cows graze.In the beginning the {Celts probably went there to pray to their dead but now it's just standing idle. Today there are still {Celts}but they are not divided in religion or belief. To be a {Celt}you have to be either { {Cornish, Scottish, Welsh or Irish}.
